mapper.select: select id, centerx, centery, createtime, shiftx, shifty, shiftz, minx, miny, minz, maxx, maxy, maxz, mdnx, mdny, mdnz, minlevel, maxlevel, thumb, productstatus, comments from rawinfo where (id = #{id}) ;

select id, centerx, centery, createtime, shiftx, shifty, shiftz, minx, miny, minz, maxx, maxy, maxz, mdnx, mdny, mdnz, minlevel, maxlevel, thumb, productstatus, comments from rawinfo where (createtime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and minx<#{refx} and maxx>#{refx} and miny<#{refy} and maxy>#{refy}) ;

select id, centerx, centery, createtime, shiftx, shifty, shiftz, minx, miny, minz, maxx, maxy, maxz, mdnx, mdny, mdnz, minlevel, maxlevel, thumb, productstatus, comments from rawinfo where (createtime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}) ;
